venue.address_1: Contact Janet for the Street address.
venue.name: Janet Applefield"s Home

item.description: The book is The Grave Digge'rs Daughter by Joyce Carol Oats. We are meeting at Janet Applefield's home. We have some available spots. Please contact Janet if you're interrested in joining us. There has been some renewed interrest in this particular book club. If you can not make this book club event but you would like to host the next Book Club and you have a book suggestion for the next meeting please contact Kiki. There has been an interresting suggestion for another new Book Club. When I have more information about it I will put it on the dicussion board. Kiki ;-)
item.name: Book Club
